solution_line_template: Samantha found {samantha_multiplier} times the amount of items as Tanya's {tanya_items} items so Samantha found {samantha_multiplier}*{tanya_items} = <<{samantha_multiplier}*{tanya_items}={samantha_items}>>{samantha_items} items

Lewis found {lewis_more_than_samantha} more items than Samantha who found {samantha_items} so he found {lewis_more_than_samantha}+{samantha_items} = <<{lewis_more_than_samantha}+{samantha_items}={lewis_items}>>{lewis_items} items
